Photographer: [Photographer's Name] If the photographer's name is not known please indicate IPPA Staff as the Photographer
label: A group of immigrants of the Falashmura Jews from Ethiopia arrived today to Ben Gurion airport Wuthun the group, the last Ethiopian Jewish spiritual leader Kes Taye Areyani, arrived in Israel today in a direct flight from Ethiopia.
